setting.label: Dropbox settings
setting.description: Dropbox bundle require Access Token. First you need create Dropbox 'app' Create app. Select 'Scoped access', type access - full, type any app name. After app created go to permissions and set all checkboxes under 'Files and folders' section. Select 'Access token expiration' - No expiration, then press 'Generated access token' to obtain access token
